nodes.name: DaiPriceOracle

nodes.documentation: Get the new price that would be stored if updated right now.
nodes.name: getBoundedTargetPrice

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Monetary.Price memory) view returns (struct Monetary.Price memory)
function (struct Monetary.Price memory) view returns (struct Monetary.Price memory)

nodes.documentation:
Get the USD price of DAI that this contract will move towards when updated. This price is
not bounded by the variables governing the maximum deviation from the old price.
nodes.name: getTargetPrice

nodes.documentation: Get the USD price of ETH according the Maker Medianizer contract.

nodes.documentation: Get the USD price of DAI according to OasisDEX given the USD price of ETH.
nodes.name: getOasisPrice

nodes.documentation: Get the USD price of DAI according to Uniswap given the USD price of ETH.

devdoc.title: DaiPriceOracle

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
